title: Stunning Fishtown Industrial Loft Rental
description:
One-of-a-kind condo in a converted elevator factory located in the heart of Fishtown. Soaring ceilings, private roof deck with sweeping views of Center City, custom built-ins, and smart home features are just the beginning. This condo was even featured in Philadelphia Magazine. The open concept living space is expansive, allowing for an immense amount of flexibility. Light fills the condo through the large 10-foot windows, and designer light fixtures are scattered throughout. The kitchen features Carrera Marble countertops, a professional-grade Viking Range and commercial hood, a Sub-Zero wine refrigerator, a large Fisher-Paykel refrigerator, and a stainless steel dishwasher. The newly renovated bathroom is complete with fixtures by Brixo, including two rain shower heads, body jets, and a hand shower, along with a brand new water heater. The private bedroom area features a massive floor-to-ceiling bookshelf wall with vintage rolling library ladder. Storage space is abundant, with a private loft storage space in the condo, as well as a community storage room for bicycles and other odds-and-ends. With a massive freight elevator available for use, moving bulky furniture and other items into and out of the loft could not be easier. The loft is located in a coveted part of Fishtown, just two blocks from the Market-Frankford Like (MFL) and within easy access to I-95, I-476, and I-76. It is steps from the Delaware River Trail, and a short walk to the best bars, cafes, and restaurants in Fishtown.
Condo is available unfurnished beginning April 1, 2023. Minimum one (1) year lease, renewable annually, or on a month-to-month basis for an additional $100 per month. Successful credit check and rental/employment references required as part of rental agreement. Electricity, gas, and water are included in rent. Tenant is responsible for cable and internet. Building is pet friendly; however, each pet is subject to an additional fee of $100 per month, and must be approved in advance by owner. First and last month's rent, plus security deposit equal in the amount of one month's rent, are required prior to move in.

title: Beautiful 3 Bedroom in Graduate Hospital with Garage Parking
description:
This 3-Bedroom/3.5-Bathroom Townhouse is located on a quiet, residential street just off of 19th and Washington Ave. Surrounded by some of Philadelphia's greatest bars, restaurants, and shops, you will love this location! This location also offers easy access to Broad Street, I-76, and Washington Ave. which make commuting throughout the rest of the city a breeze. This home is available now and ready for immediate move-in!
Arrive at the home and immediately fall in love with the traditional brick exterior of the home and one-car garage. You will absolutely love being able to pull into your garage every night and having no need to circle the block looking for parking - an amenity that cannot be understated!
Once inside the home, you will love the open concept floor plan between the living room and kitchen. Complete with hardwood flooring, tall ceilings, and large windows which allow plenty of natural light to pour in, you will love this living room. There is enough room for a sectional, coffee table, TV stand, side tables, and more! Additionally, there is room for a dining set as you head towards the kitchen. This open concept floor plan will be perfect for when you're entertaining friends or hosting holidays!
The kitchen is absolutely stunning and includes white shaker-style cabinets with brushed nickel hardware, granite countertops, stainless steel refrigerator, four-burner electric cooktop, wall-mounted oven and microwave, and dishwasher. There is a kitchen island with an overhanging countertop which can be used for barstool seating to create an additional dining area. There is also a custom tile backsplash which adds the perfect pop of color and brings the entire design together. You will love preparing meals and entertaining friends in this beautiful kitchen! All three bedrooms are a comfortable size and include hardwood flooring, ample closet space, and large windows which allow even more natural light to pour into the home.
The master bedroom includes its own en-suite bathroom and it is luxurious. Complete with stone tile flooring, modern vanity, and shower with custom tile surround, this bathroom truly feels like having a spa inside your own home! In addition to the master bedroom, there are two full bathrooms and a powder room in the home as well. In addition to all of the great features throughout the home, there is also a roof top deck! This deck is completely private and available to the residents of this home only. With enough space for an outdoor furniture set, this deck is the perfect spot for outdoor relaxation and for soaking up breathtaking views of the Philadelphia skyline!
Tenants are responsible for electric, gas, water, and cable/internet in addition to rent each month. Pets permitted with additional $500.00 deposit! Application Qualifications: Minimum monthly income 3 times the tenant’s portion of the monthly rent, acceptable rental history, acceptable credit history and acceptable criminal history.
Listing courtesy of Bay Management Group Philadelphia
